      class  LuceneIndex

      class  LuceneIndexNIOFS
      LuceneIndex which uses a NIOFSDirectory instead of MMapDirectory to avoid the JVM crash (see http:// stackoverflow.com/questions/8224843/jvm-crashes-on-lucene-datainput- readvint).
